channel.title: Get Involved on LiberCarta
channel.description: Recent content in Get Involved on LiberCarta

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Have a question? Want to say hello?

Libercarta is a small, growing project and we would love to hear from you. Whether you are an author, reader, or supporter, feel free to reach out.

Use the form below to get in touch. We will do our best to reply soon.

item.title: Join The Authors
item.description:
We’re excited to get to know you.

Please share a few details about yourself so we can create your author page on LiberCarta. This includes your name, a short bio, and optionally a headshot or links to your website or social profiles.

Your email will not be published. We’ll only use it to contact you if needed.

item.title: Submit Your Book
item.description:
Ready to have your book featured on LiberCarta?

Use the form below to share your book details, including the title, description, genre, and cover image. If you have already submitted your author information, this will help us connect your book with your author page.

You are welcome to submit more than one book. Please fill out a separate form for each title. We will not share your email address and will only contact you if we need to clarify anything.
